title: Normals
body: Am i supposed to lane with a diamond riven main in normal games? can riot just reset the normal system? It's been 3 months, i even met some challenger and master tier ppl in normal games, i am not even in that level, that almost makes me lost every game if i dont play my main role, normals are even harder than ranked games, i am not having fun in normals at all....

replies.body: Your ranked status isn't taken into account in normals. Your MMR plays a smaller role, and mostly the system is aiming for balanced teams rather than trying to match you with players of similar rank. You may want to focus more on ranked if you're looking for that type of gameplay.

LOL YEAH RIGHT

Playing ranked as G1 and my games are ALL PLAT 3 PLAYERS.

So nice having to beat Plat 3 players to get out of G1 tell me again how if I want to play with people of the same rank I should play ranked.
